phrases: Akatsuki...
Where am I?
Where am I going?
Come one, come all!
If you do not buy one today, your Christmas cake...
How about that?
It turned into a plain old cake!
It is hip with today's youth!
If you buy one now, it comes with a reindeer mask!
You there!
Yes, you, beautiful!
Damned adventurers...
A Lost Child at Dawn
A Lost Child at Dawn.
There is no need to worry.
When Akatsuki wakes up, Henrietta will contact us.
Yes...
Are not you cold?
You have been standing by the window for a while.
You are right...
Compared to where I used to live, it is cold here.
You were not born in Akihabara?
No.
I was born in a town called Kiyose.
In this world, it would be around Nobidome District.
You are not a noble, Rieze?
No, I am not.
I was born in a small, normal home.
I do not know anything, do I?
About you...
No, about Akatsuki or Henrietta, either.
Or Marielle.
And...
And...
No.
It is not that I did not know.
It is that I never tried to know.
Not even about Crusty...
It is especially cold today.
In school, I was a good student.
The teachers loved me, and I was adept at my studies.
When I showed how clever I was, everyone praised me.
I became skilled at it.
In that sense,
I am glad I joined D.D.D. when I came here.
I met a lot of people,
and I was forced to realize that the only world I had ever tried to see was so small.
If I had not, I may have gone on like that forever, with something very important missing.
I was really on a bad path.
Yes.
What is most important is always there, somewhere.
And because it is important,
I think you need to treasure it.
That is why I think I need...
well, to be a princess.
But I am never good enough.
So...
So I want to treat you properly, Rieze!
Otherwise, I will not have the right to be treated kindly by you,
or to delude myself into thinking I am protecting you.
Treat me properly?
Very well.
Then here is my first bit of advice.
To treat someone properly is too difficult.
Let us be friends, Lenessia.
I am an adventurer, but if you do not mind that...
No...
This could not be...
Where am I heading?
Being pushed, rushed, driven along...
Where am I trying to go?
I may not have a destination.
I am just trying to run.
I did not think it would be so quiet here.
Yeah.
Something disappeared...
Did you also feel it, my lord?
Akatsuki...
I see.
Amazing, is not it?
It is not snow, is it?
No.
Everyone is thoughts...
The memory fragments they offered up,
so they could rise up once more.
You were defeated, Akatsuki?
That is right.
I died.
I had almost figured something out...
I see.
So was I.
I died.
You, too, my lord?
Yeah.
It is been a heck of a Christmas Eve, my lord.
I failed.
I was naIve.
I could not trust them enough.
I do not understand.
It is not that I am upset because I could not win.
You did not do the best you could.
You did not do what you needed to do.
It is strange.
I did not think I would see you here.
Yeah, my lord.
It is strange.
Is it only a coincidence?
No, I am sure it is because I wanted to see my lord.
I wanted him to pat me on the head.
Maybe I can find that which I almost found,
if I search for it myself.
I am going to try again.
I will, too, I guess.
Everyone taught me.
My lord...
I passed through some quiet place...
It is gone.
But...
I feel like I found something,
like I understand something.
So there is something I should do...
Something I must do.
Akatsuki!
Are you okay?
You do not have any scars, do you?
S-Stop...
You are so cute!
I thought it was about time for you to wake up.
Um...
I know this is not an appropriate request,
but I would like you all to help me.
Would you share your Teachings with me?
I want to capture that murderer.
Nazuna, did not Soujirou use the Teachings?
Yeah.
But it was not enough.
Yep.
Why do you seek them, despite that?
Because...
I want to end the murders!
And not just your Teachings, but... well...
If there is a way to stop him, please tell me anything you know!
You think you can beat him?
I do not know,
but I have to do something to end it.
With my lord gone, someone has to do it.
What do you mean?
Shiroe is not here?
We were asked to keep it a secret,
but that is right.
At the moment, Shiro is away from Akihabara.
Now I get it.
No wonder you are so desperate.
Well?
I have not heard your answer.
Do you think you can beat him?
Do you think you can end this?
Can you do it alone?
I cannot.
I cannot do it alone.
That is why I want your help.
Please help me!
You half-passed, I would say.
There are eight Teachings that D.D.D. is aware of.
I have already gained my lord's permission.
He is told me to share them with you.
Really...
To come all this way, just to start over as a middle schooler...
Does not seem there are any more goblins over here, either.
Yeah.
My lord...
Are you bored?
You got me.
I am, yes.
Deal with it.
I have dealt with it all this time, and I am still bored.
What is wrong?
Lately, my weapon's been acting strangely.
Why not send it to be repaired?
Yeah...
But it is not any less powerful, so I have just overlooked it.
Its name is Disaster, right?
Yeah.
Its flavor text is pretty dark, as well.
It seems to be fine.
Sorry to bother you.
Onigiri Shop Enmusubi
What a relief!
Research announcements are always tense, no matter how often you do them.
But it looks like everyone was surprised.
For one of Roderic Research's recent announcements, it had a lot of impact.
That now everyone can cook, even if their sub-class is not chef.
It is limited to simple stuff like salad...
But why is a change like this happening?
Guild master?
Oh, you can keep eating.
Our investigation's interim reports are in, so I will just briefly interrupt.
Personality Woman Man
Voice Sex Differences
There are three things I need to announce.
First, regarding sex differences between now and when this was a game.
Sex differences?
Some people play a different sex than they are in real life, right?
He is talking about that.
RDR has reported in the past
that personality is influenced by a person's body.
But it appears the voice is affected, as well.
An adventurer with a female body will find their voice
gradually becoming feminine,
even if the player is actually a man.
Next is optical observation.
There is still a lot we do not know,
but it seems the distance between Akihabara and Mt. Fuji is increasing.
Actually, the distance between any two points
is increasing by a small amount.
Excuse me.
Go ahead.
Is that occurring everywhere?
Does that mean Yamato is getting bigger?
We believe so.
Lastly, regarding flavor text...
As you know, flavor text is merely
Healing Potion (Basic)
Effect/ Healing Potion (Basic) Restores a small amount of HP
an explanation that describes where an item originated or what it is.
Explanation/ Healing Potion (Basic) A magical medicine created by adventurers.
Its capabilities, flavor, and scent change depending on the skill of the creator.
As the name suggests, it is just for flavor.
It has no in-game effects.
Yeah,
it is just to add atmosphere...
Yes.
It should have no meaning at all.
But we have confirmed
that some items' flavor texts are having real-world effects.
No way.
Could so many coincidences really occur at once?
Should not we assume that this world is undergoing some large-scale change?
The Apocalypse is not over yet.
I have already heard the broader details.
The murderer is a Person of the Land.
You told them.
If this gets out,
relations between adventurers and People of the Land will worsen in Akihabara.
Akatsuki tried to resolve the situation because she was concerned about that.
Right?
I can understand that.
Though I cannot imagine you will be able to hide it completely.
Not with all these victims...
Is the West Wind Brigade going public with this?
No.
Souji said he is pulling out.
Though that is up to you two.
That is...
Stop wasting time confirming things, and get on with the lecture.
Is this what you mean?
You two were vain enough to think you could deal with this yourselves.
You knew you should have spoken to us, did not you?
Are not you being a little arrogant?
Are not you insulting the people around you?
How long do you intend to remain alone?
Do not you think it is childish to tell yourself
that all you need is Shiroe?
True, it is always been that way.
I was content with how comfortable I felt in his shadow.
I never tried to get close to anyone else.
Because I was totally reliant on him...
When he left, I suddenly could not do anything.
Not even what he asked me to do.
Did you think you have been coming here to protect her?
You were not the only one
who had the job of visiting Watermaple House.
I was, as well, and so was Rieze.
I am not the only one my lord relied on.
Of course.
But...
It is true that I wanted to help her because she was trying so hard.
So...
I want your help.
I need your help.
Yes, of course.
Rieze and I will help you.
But who should you be saying that to?
Who...
Akatsuki...
Akatsuki is my friend!
Lenessia is doing her best,
so I want to help her!
I want you all...
all of us... to help her.
Because we are friends.
Very well.
Let us stop that murderer.
I will come up with a plan.
I am a friend, too, after all.
My lord, the sun has set.
Let us hurry.
A broken spearhead...
What is the matter?
It looks like this is a training area.
For goblins.
Goblins?
Surely not.
I have never heard of them training.
I am sorry...
It is acting strangely again.
Sansa!
My lord!
My lord!
My lord?
The Graupel Sword Byakumaru?
That is the katana the samurai had?
I knew it on sight.
I saw it many times at Amenoma.
Marie, is something wrong?
W-Well, just...
It is about time, and I have not gotten a call.
Shiroe and Naotsugu are not playing around.
They will not always have time.
Yeah, I know, but...
Today, something just does not feel right.
Did you notice anything else about the murderer?
One second.
Yes?
Yes.
What?
That cannot be...
The murderer's mind is taken from him as he becomes a true monster.
Is he remembering a legendary hero?
Rieze and Henrietta begin preparations for a raid.
Akatsuki attempts to master the Teachings.
At some point, they find themselves with many friends.
Twenty-six, in all.
Next time: The Maidens of Watermaple.
The Maidens of Watermaple
Rise up once more.
